sentences: In the informal group, parties addressed expectations for Durban.
A proposal on financing for phase 3 (full implementation) from a group of countries was presented.
Parties continued discussions on financing for REDD+.
On sources of financing, many parties highlighted that REDD+ should be supported through different financing options and that this decision should be made by each country.
Some parties highlighted the important role of private investment and market mechanisms and others emphasized that ecosystem services, including biodiversity co-benefits, should be considered.
One party cautioned against market mechanisms and the commoditization of nature.
Many parties underscored the need to include a REDD+ specific window under the Green Climate Fund.
Cautioning against duplication, some parties said this was being addressed by the Transitional Committee for the design of the Green Climate Fund.

Some parties noted that a possible outcome for Durban will be contingent on the outcome of ongoing relevant discussions under the SBSTA and the Transitional Committee, while others emphasized that discussions in the group should be independent from discussions in other fora.
